DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if there is an effect on the pharmacokinetics of bosutinib when administered with lansoprazole.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Effect Of Lansoprazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Bosutinib In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and women of nonchildbearing potential, between the ages of 18 to 50 years old. Any cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, respiratory, gastrointestinal, endocrine, immunologic, dermatologic, hematologic, neurologic, or psychiatric disease.
